page.title: 02ACADEMY AND HOUSING
page.content: In Stromness a new Academy is being built at Garson. As it's only being built in sections it won't be finished till 1988, so both old and new schools are used meantime with pupils being bussed between. There's four houses - Thorfinn, Magnus, Sigurd and Rognavald. 41 teachers, 1 headmaster,2 technicians, 2 janitors, 1 librarian, 2 secretaries and a nautical instructor keep the pupils busy. The design of the new school, its being rather like warehouses from the outside, has caused local comment. Usually when any building is done in Stromness the style of the house must fit in with its surroundings. Many houses have a preservation order on them. A housing scheme at Grieveship was designed to resemble Stromness' jigsaw puzzle of older housing, but many are critical of it.
